ygData.messageBody:
--- "Dmitry M. Devishev" <dmitry@...> wrote:
>> Those are at nearly the top of the 1-15 level 1hS
>> weapon scale (very top is Dwarven 1h Axe). The
>> next steps up are Barbed Leather Whip and Polished
>> Granite Tomahawk. BLW goes for about 150pp, PGT
>> about 250pp.
>
> There are also good magical 2h weapons like bone
> bladed claymore (17/45, costs around 250pp, but i
> heard you can get it in Befallen for as low as
> 150pp) or blackened iron bastard sword (20/47, costs
> around 500pp, maybe less in Runnyeye).

He was asking about 1hS weapons. BBC has a good ratio
for the level, but the -8 AGI is a *huge* hit to take
for it. BBCs are pretty cheap on Tarew Marr these
days because people are really not into that AGI hit.

The BIBS, on the other hand, is rapidly becoming the
next PGT level farmed item. For a while you could go
into Runnyeye and find less than ten people in the
entire zone at peak times. These days the numbers are
up and there are a lot of killstealer casters farming
the Dazed Goblin Knight. And when they get the BIBS
they're charging opening bids of 600pp - 700pp. At
the trade bazaar a couple of BIBS went up and were
going for close to 1000pp.

The sword's nice, but not that nice. Grrrrrrr.
